channel.title: bihar on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu
channel.description: Recent content in bihar on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu

item.title: A quick post
item.description: Reading old newspaper clipping fascinate me; an article which earns a good amount space on that day and most likely people read and forgot. and here I am reading it after days with a fresh eye. And most times it turns out to be a great story to read with eagerness. This one was bit special which caught my eyes today was “Chaturanan Mishra passed away”; now there are few things which made me to write this quick post.
